categories: Category:Star Wars: Return of the Jedi TPBs

nodes.text: The Marvel Comics Illustrated Version of Return of the Jedi
The Marvel Comics Illustrated Version of Return of the Jedi collects issues 1-4 in the Marvel Star Wars Return of the Jedi series of comics.
It is a complete comic book adaption of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, and is a 4 1/8 by 7 inch paperback novel sized comic.
The plot is the same as the film of Return of the Jedi.
